name: Bogs Night Garden Rain Boots - Women's
description: Waterproof construction keeps you dry when traversing slushy sidewalks and mucky garden paths. Super stylish and way more comfortable than you’d expect a rubber boot to be.100% waterproof construction.Large handles make pulling the boots on a cinch.Bloom™ eva footbeds are algae based and help clean polluted water sources.DuraFresh™ natural odour control.Grippy rubber outsole.
